website_summaries.verdict: A premium Lipo battery bag that is waterproof, fireproof and explosion-proof.
pros: Provides plenty of room for up to 3 Mavic Pro drone batteries
Long side flaps are easy to fold in as needed
Hook and loop closure ensures you can securely close the bag
More affordable than many similar bags
Convenient travel-size bag enables you to bring your Lipo batteries with you on the go
cons: Overall construction leaves much to be desired

customer_reviews.title: This Teenitor bag won't help in the event of a lipo fire, see the pictures.
customer_reviews.text: The picture shone here is of my Teenitor Fire and Explosionproof case. As you can see it is hardly fire and explosionproof. In fact it didn't even help. The battery burned right through the bag and caught my work bench on fire, then burned my transmitter, and some other things too. If I wouldn't have been home, it might have evwn burned down my house. Never trust one of these bags to help contain a fire. They won't even slow it down. I thought I was being safe, boy was I wrong. I now charge my lipos on the side of my house on a concrete slab with nothing near them to catch on fire. This Teenitor bag Failed, miserably.
customer_reviews.author: Capt Bill

customer_reviews.title: nearly burned my house down
customer_reviews.text: Nearly burned my house down. Don't buy this garbage it will not protect you. Get a good one that is reputable. When the battery exploded and burned there was nothing left but the wires. This bag may as well have been made from duct tape.
customer_reviews.author: Chad M.

customer_reviews.title: Has worked well, though I never put it to the test
customer_reviews.text: Have not tested how well it works when you need it (i.e. battery is on fire), but it has worked well to charge packs in around the house. Can collapse to take up next to no room and then holds it's shape well so it's easy to use. Definitely not an expert on Lipo charging bags but I don't see anything wrong with this thing
customer_reviews.author: Josh Smith

customer_reviews.title: Construction is good, velcro is great
customer_reviews.text: Well made Lipo battery pack. Large size fits TWO Phantom 3 batteries snugly. Construction is good, velcro is great. Refer to photos!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Le Pham

customer_reviews.title: Well made Lipo battery protection
customer_reviews.text: This case is very well made, and has long side flaps that fold in. These flaps will help to cover the battery under the top flap. The top flap attaches to the front of the case with strong velcro. I am currently using it to safely store 3 of my 3S batteries in. I will be using it to charge them in as well. This is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Alan E Miller

customer_reviews.title: If you have read up on these lipos you know you need to be careful with them so I think its a good piece of safety equipment
customer_reviews.text: Well I got one of these for safety sake. I have never experienced a battery failure and hope I don't and with this little bag feel a bit safer it might help if something did happen as opposed not having anything at all. If you have read up on these lipos you know you need to be careful with them so I think its a good piece of safety equipment. I have several RC vehicles so its nice to put them inside of this when charging or storing.
customer_reviews.author: Horse-N-Round

customer_reviews.title: not bad but needs improvement...
customer_reviews.text: the inside is fiberglass and little pieces of it will get all over the place and get stuck in your skin! if you intend to use this product wear gloves! the outside is plastic and honestly looks and feels identical to duck taype... also the edges are just nylon. Only one of these three materials doesn't burn very well... i cant see this standing up to a LiPo fire for more time than it takes to pick it up with a shovel and throw it outside. But at the same time you should never charge a LiPo battery unattended anyway so overall id say it serves its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Hartsell

customer_reviews.title: Keep battery flare-up/explosive to a minimum
customer_reviews.text: Hopefully I will never have to test it's actual safety feature but it is used if the need ever arises. Batteries of all sizes even most childrens 6 volt battery for ride - on toys the only thing I would like is US 120V fiberglass sewn plug slots for the batteries that has to be placed inside the charger then the charger has to plug directly into the US 120V pronged outlet
customer_reviews.author: MOPAR BLUE

customer_reviews.title: Holds Mavic Pro batteries!
customer_reviews.text: A bit tight, but you can hold 3 DJI Mavic Pro batteries in this configuration or two other ways. I would recommend a slightly wider bag so you can fit 4 properly or maybe individual bags? 2 batteries would move around a lot and you can only put them ontop of each other sideways, not side to side.
customer_reviews.author: bumblingbuyer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Seems of good quality. You could probably fit several batteries in there (I only have one). Velcro is extremely tight. The top does not enclose entirely; not sure if that was by design or not. Only wish is that it had a handle integrated on it to carry.
customer_reviews.author: kidd3791

customer_reviews.title: 4 batteries, fits my charger cables.
customer_reviews.text: This bag is just the right size and shape for holding four batteries (2200 mah in my case) while they are charging on my multi-charger.
customer_reviews.author: Duane Pinkerton

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent product to protect our batteries mini drones
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product to protect our batteries mini drones, because it is very small. It is built with good materials and looks aesthetically good. I tried it with several batteries of different size and fit very well. In short, an excellent product that we can avoid accidents.
customer_reviews.author: Elenmanuel Peña

customer_reviews.title: A decent grab bag for all your small LiPo batteries
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality bag. Firm enough to support itself and mostly stay in shape. The side flaps get in the way a bit, but I imagine they are important to prevent flames escaping through the sides. I’m keeping 16x 1S 600mAh LiPo batteries in it, and it’s less than 1/4 full. Haven’t tested its flame proofing yet, thankfully.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: My battery exploded and this worked
customer_reviews.text: My massive lipo that barely fit in this exploded inside of it. I was looking right at it and the case jumped and puffed out and I thought what was that!?! Then I realized what had happened. This case prevented and damage of any kind. Couldn't be happier. God only knows what would have happened without it.
customer_reviews.author: Lorimer91

customer_reviews.title: It is smaller that I thought it would be so I recommend measuring out the dimensions before purchase to see how ...
customer_reviews.text: Bag appears to be of adequate quality. It is smaller that I thought it would be so I recommend measuring out the dimensions before purchase to see how big it is. The seams are holding up so far after light use. The Velcro is well stitched. I place my lipos in a steel box in addition to this bag for extra safety.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Probably fireproof probably...
customer_reviews.text: It's an allegedly fireproof bag for your Lipo batteries. Pretty basic, fits probably 4-6 batteries depending on the type. I didn't try to light it on fire to see if it really is. I guess it makes me feel better knowing there is a reduced chance of accidentally burning my house down.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Better safe than sorry
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is it's better to be safe than sorry. I have 2 fire bags. 1 for full charged batteries and 1 for discharged. Glad I bout this because when batteries are in storage mode I put them in this then put this in bigger bag. No reason to put my children and family at risk
customer_reviews.author: Shaun from Enfield, Conn

customer_reviews.title: Fits two 3s batteries easily
customer_reviews.text: This easily fits two 3s LiPo batteries and allows the connectors to be routed out of the bag for safe charging. I have not had a LiPo fire so I don’t know how fireproof this bag is but it gives me good peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Cranford

customer_reviews.title: Trial by fire..........Passed!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, does what it claims. I am the type that I will put the product to the test.....this one passed!!!! It will not withstand a blowtorch or anything, but a spark or flame generated from a battery is easily contained. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: LEWS THERIN

customer_reviews.title: OK for storage, probably doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a traxxas 7600mah 2s lipo. I take good care of it, so I thought a bag would be good. After reading other reviews, I don’t think it works, but still good for storage and maybe some protection.
customer_reviews.author: Steph T

customer_reviews.title: Good fit for small drone batteries and charger
customer_reviews.text: I use several very small 3.7 volt batteries in my drone and this bag is the perfect size. I keep 6 batteries and charger in it with room to spare. It seals up well with the velcro closure, even with the charger wire exiting the end. Seems well made.
customer_reviews.author: cwd777

customer_reviews.title: Well made and looks like it will do the job
customer_reviews.text: Luckily I haven't found out if it's really explosion proof and hope I never do. But it appears to be well made and has a secure closure. It adds a level of safety and protection and I'm glad I have it. My 18650 cells fit well in it too.
customer_reviews.author: Chicago John

customer_reviews.title: Had 4x 1S 250mah LiPos explode while charging in this ...
customer_reviews.text: Had 4x 1S 250mah LiPos explode while charging in this bag. It let out the smoke and the outer casing melting a little bit but it otherwise completely contained the batteries as they lit off one by one. Buying another one to replace the one that sacrificed itself for my safety :)
customer_reviews.author: Eric D

customer_reviews.title: Better than nothing.
customer_reviews.text: Can’t rate this item until a battery explodes or catches fire. So hope this never happens. I would say buy and use at your own risk. This is better than nothing at all.
customer_reviews.author: Alfadawg

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this item for anyone charging batteries
customer_reviews.text: My son has several quads, and he never had a battery safe bag. It cam promptly and well packaged. My son recharged three batteries, and so far no mishaps. However, if there is, this will highly reduce the chances of damages caused by a battery exploding. I highly recommend this item for anyone charging batteries, regardless of the type. Great job Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I use a 4s Lipoly batteries in my drone racers ...
customer_reviews.text: I use a 4s Lipoly batteries in my drone racers.... the Teenitor fireproof Explosion proof bag offers a level of safety and comfort for charging my batteries. It folds down neatly and fits in my field box.
customer_reviews.author: telles

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product to have around the house I won't loose ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product to have around the house I won't loose any of my batteries plus it's a bonus for me. I don't have to worry about accidentally fire causes that comes from the batteries it's fireproof thanks for a big help to me
customer_reviews.author: Robert Betts

customer_reviews.title: Great Piece of Safety Equipment.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the design of the bag in that it takes into account the side flaps for possible spray if the battery ruptures. The bag is big enough to hold my largest batteries while charging. This is one piece of safety equipment you need to get if you charge LiPo batteries. The chance of fire is very small, but with this bag, you cut the risk of damage to near zero. I recommend this to anyone who charges LiPo batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Lipo storage
customer_reviews.text: Not perfectly sealed. However definitely will reduce possible damages. Piece of mind. Decent for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Meyers

customer_reviews.title: Provides a measure of safety should a battery burst into ...
customer_reviews.text: Provides a measure of safety should a battery burst into flames. YouTube videos show that this safe is just the thing for the smaller batteries I am charging.
customer_reviews.author: Pork Chop Kid

customer_reviews.title: but otherwise good stuff. hopefully i'll never have to review it ...
customer_reviews.text: could use a small space for putting the cables through to charge, but otherwise good stuff. hopefully i'll never have to review it based on it's fire retardant characteristics. sidenote - bear in mind the sizes listed are IN MILLIMETRES. so the 'big size' bag comfortable holds the two venom 4000mAh hard case cells i also ordered, but no room for a third. not the sellers fault, but i was surprised when i opened the box.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: A handle on top would make it 5 stars for me, but still very nice bag.
customer_reviews.text: The size of the pouch fits my lipo batteries beautifully and the velcro is strong and secure. The only thing is that it is difficult to carry if you already have any other items in your hands. It would've been much more helpful if it had a handle on the top just like another large size lipo battery bag that I have. The handle would've made me give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Martus

customer_reviews.title: ... up or catch on fire in it but seems like it would at least slow the progress of destruction
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had a battery blow up or catch on fire in it but seems like it would at least slow the progress of destruction.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Swisher

customer_reviews.title: Works, form factor can be a problem.
customer_reviews.text: Not bad, not great. The style of opening is welcome as the bag/envelope style will give you a rash via the fiberglass being embedded in your arm. This format eliminates the problem. This unit fits 4-5 3s/4s 1300mah easy, beyond that it gets tight. If you are serious get 2+ of these, not a bad purchase, but the depth should be a little bigger IMHO.
customer_reviews.author: smc

customer_reviews.title: if you use lipo batteries you need to use this ...
customer_reviews.text: if you use lipo batteries you need to use this, i use this every time i charge my lipos it makes me feel safer. get one of these
customer_reviews.author: Berl Lolmaugh

customer_reviews.title: Nice to use in carry-on for all your Li batteries
customer_reviews.text: Better safe than sorry- this way all your Li batteries are in one safe place!
customer_reviews.author: Bruce W.

customer_reviews.title: Must have for LiPo charging
customer_reviews.text: Works great, fits a large number of batteries. A small port at the bottom edge of the bag (for the battery cord to come out of) would be nice, my battery kind of "hangs" by the cord when charging since the battery is thin, the cord is short, and it needs to get out at the top flap to reach the charger.
customer_reviews.author: Darren

customer_reviews.title: Very thick and solid
customer_reviews.text: Works well, you can tell it will protect if something went wrong. Thanks for making such a great product for such a low price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As advertised. No problems at security check. 2 ...
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. No problems at security check. 2 batteries from my DJI Mavic Pro fit well. I could probably squeeze in a third as well. Remember to always carry-on and NOT check in.
customer_reviews.author: Varun

customer_reviews.title: good quality lipo bag
customer_reviews.text: good battery bag, comfortably fits two 2S 6800 lipo RC car batteries. can get a third one in if I wanted. Velcro is tough and good quality. I only place one in the bag while charging, and can easily arrange the cables so they go out the corners of the bag.
customer_reviews.author: A Miller

customer_reviews.title: ... be made out of the cheap lunch box material like others i have seen) fits about 6- 10 batteries
customer_reviews.text: seems to get the job done ( hope i never need to put its fire retardant capabilities to the test) but it doesn't seem to be made out of the cheap lunch box material like others i have seen) fits about 6- 10 batteries , 6 with space 10 packed ,
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Would Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I am new to the electric RC world and after reading the horror stories of LiPo batteries catching fire I had to get something to contain that. I have been very happy with this bag. I use it when charging my battery, transporting it and storage. The build quality has been good and the materials seem excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Glaus Family Prime

customer_reviews.title: In my opinion, a must have.
customer_reviews.text: A neighbor's Uncle burned down his garage charging a hobby car battery, so when my 9-year-old is charging his battery, I want it in one of these.
customer_reviews.author: James E. Moll

customer_reviews.title: Explosion proof duct tape
customer_reviews.text: Kinda small. Looks like it's made out of duct tape.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thick material with strong Velcro Small footprint
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would be bigger but it fits up to 4 lipos inside for either storage or charging. Folds nice and flat and doesn't take much room in my tool box. Material is Thick and Velcro is tough...very satisfied with the product so far, but only a real lipo Fire or explosion will tests this product, I just hope it won't be me 😋
customer_reviews.author: GearUpBaby

customer_reviews.title: Saved my house from burning down
customer_reviews.text: I charged a LIPO and it started to swell. I put it in the case and took it outside and a few minutes later the battery exploded and burned and the case kept it from setting my house on fire. the battery burned and totalled the case but it was contained. I will never charge a battery again without using a case.
customer_reviews.author: EMTaylor

customer_reviews.title: WARNING: NOT Fireproof!!!
customer_reviews.text: False advertising!! This will NOT stop fire nor is it fireproof. I tested the "fireproof-nes" of the item with a lighter and the outside melted in 15 seconds but the insides seem to be okay and just dis-colored. Once the exterior started melting I stopped the flames to prevent the plastic like exterior from being ignited. It _may_ slow burning of a lipo, but I will not risk my life and house to find out. Will return for false advertising.
customer_reviews.author: NaN

customer_reviews.title: Does what it's meant to
customer_reviews.text: Pretty thick little protector pocket. Hopefully I never have a need to review its ability to restrict fires but it does its job. Holds my Phantom 3 standard battery comfortably, you could potentially fit 2 batteries in it but it would bulge. Some reviews mentioned a gap in the package that fire could escape from, but I can't see the gap they talk about.
customer_reviews.author: Ty C.

customer_reviews.title: Good size
customer_reviews.text: I is larger than I thought. This is a good thing.
customer_reviews.author: JimD

customer_reviews.title: Would prefer a zipper, there's way too much velcro ...
customer_reviews.text: Would prefer a zipper, there's way too much velcro on this bag for how small it is. Kind of a pain to open!
customer_reviews.author: Turk

customer_reviews.title: good bag for the purpose
customer_reviews.text: The bag is big enough to hold multiple batteries. While I have not experience any battery explosion yet, the bag looks strong enough to handle one if it happens.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Just as expected
customer_reviews.text: The battery bag is just as expected. I have not had an issue with a Lipo battery to test out the capabilities of the bag, and I hope I never have to. Seems to be of high quality materials, and I expect it will do the job.
customer_reviews.author: IanS

customer_reviews.title: seems good
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I expected but handles all ll my lipos. Great Velcro flap. Seems like it will handle Battery problems
customer_reviews.author: arharris

customer_reviews.title: Teenitor fireproof Lipo battery bag
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice Lipo bag. I'm glad I bought it. This was the first time buying from the seller and I'm glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan D.

customer_reviews.title: Fits 2x 3S Lipos or a single 4S just fine. The stitching is quality and nothing is amiss ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits 2x 3S Lipos or a single 4S just fine. The stitching is quality and nothing is amiss even though I have not been very gentle with mine. Good buy will most likely buy a few more just for my 4S Lipo's.
customer_reviews.author: Tristan Hardy

customer_reviews.title: How do you review something that does nothing?
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what I can say here...I haven't had an explosion or fire yet, so no real way to know if this is doing its job. I have a little more peace of mind when I'm charging a battery for a vape, but I'd still never leave one charging overnight even in this bag. If this delays a fire long enough for me to get the extinguisher, then it'll be totally worth it...
customer_reviews.author: keywst70

customer_reviews.title: Good Product but Chroma Battery Adapter will not fit inside the Bag.
customer_reviews.text: I think its well built. Its just a tad bit small for the Chroma drone batteries with the special adapter. Its still usable with the propriatary adapter sticking out of the end. Closing the velcro flap seals it pretty good. I really think that this was designed for standard 3 cell Lipos in mind. I am glad I got it and feel safer using it.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Kinda an awkward bag because there is not a good place for the cord to easily stick out
customer_reviews.text: Kinda an awkward bag because there is not a good place for the cord to easily stick out. But it did the job.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great product and it does what it's supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: Great product and it does what it's supposed to do. Arrived quickly as well but I was a little disappointed on the size. I can barely fit 6 4s batteries in this case. If you plan to carry more than 6 batteries I would recommend getting a second case or just buy one larger one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth a try but better products are out their
customer_reviews.text: Has a deformity and I don't feel as if it safely secures the battery well enough. But works haven't had a battery blow up but hey maybe this will save my house..
customer_reviews.author: Robert Sherwin

customer_reviews.title: Seems well built and good quality - fortunately
customer_reviews.text: Seems well built and good quality - fortunately, it hasn't been tested to its full potential but I store the unused battery in it just in case... peace-of-mind.
customer_reviews.author: D. Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: Just Fine
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for my 6s. Id give it 5 stars, but I'm not sure how it performs (though I really don't want to have to find out). Seems tough enough, so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: decent deal
customer_reviews.text: haven't had any lipos catch fire yet, but for the price i think its a good deal and saftey net. only thing i dont like is it doesn't close great on small 2s lipos and larger lipos with the balance board. still works and is function just could be better.
customer_reviews.author: Tressemee

customer_reviews.title: A nice sturdy little bag for a lipo battery or two
customer_reviews.text: A nice sturdy little bag for a lipo battery or two. strong velcro on the flap and I liked how the ends had big flaps folded inward. You know, to keep the fire inside the box.
customer_reviews.author: dj

customer_reviews.title: but it seems like it'll do a decent job
customer_reviews.text: Don't set fire to your charging station! Haven't had a chance to really test the quality of this under fire, but it seems like it'll do a decent job.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Marcos

customer_reviews.title: Good bag, hope to never truly need it.
customer_reviews.text: Good size bag that I can charge my lipo battery in. I can have a charging cable come out so i can safely charge my battery. Hopefully i will never need to see how effective it is.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: but consistent precautions like using this should mitigate damage if it ever does ...
customer_reviews.text: It makes me feel safer. I have never had a LiPo fire and of course hope I never do, but consistent precautions like using this should mitigate damage if it ever does occur.
customer_reviews.author: Bob O`Bob

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. All my batteries fit in the pouch so ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. All my batteries fit in the pouch so it's big enough. Never had a fire or explosion but it does give piece of mind while charging.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works like a champ even though I haven't had a battery problem yet.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Nice bag, got it for my Phantom 3 batteries. This bag will fit 2 phantom 3 batteries pretty easily. Not sure if you can squeeze in a 3rd since I only have 2 batteries. Fits well in the camera bag and construction feels solid. Will buy additional as needed.
customer_reviews.author: rzaman

customer_reviews.title: Keep it Safe, Don't Skimp
customer_reviews.text: Small compact size will fit all size batteries. I really liked the price, only 7.80 where these are usually $20.00 at local hobby shops. I would recommend getting this item to everybody.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Van Dam

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This one is practical and looks great,I not only like its quality but also its appearance,simple but nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived promptly
customer_reviews.text: I like knowing that while I charge my batteries this product should protect against a fire.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis K.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Make sure you read the dimensions and ...
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Make sure you read the dimensions and understand this, it is not large. It is the right size for charging a few 18650 batteries which is what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Unsuspecting Customer

customer_reviews.title: Actually had a little lipo fire all contained in the ...
customer_reviews.text: Actually had a little lipo fire all contained in the bag. Saved a lot of other stuff I presume.
customer_reviews.author: descendent of Bill Wilson

customer_reviews.title: But I like it. I usually just use it to keep ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm new to the Li-po / Battery RC cars. I'm more of a Nitro head. But I like it. I usually just use it to keep the battery stored in it, when not in use and when I charge it. Its like my accessory that I take with me whenever I take the buggy out for a drive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really didn't hold well
customer_reviews.text: Didn't hold well turned out it was a little overpriced for the size. Should have looked for a better
customer_reviews.author: BT

customer_reviews.title: An opening of some sort that would allow the wires to comr out with ease would be great. If it had that I would give it ...
customer_reviews.text: I hope I never have to test the fire containing ability of this bag so I'm assuming that it will do that. An opening of some sort that would allow the wires to comr out with ease would be great. If it had that I would give it a 5 star for sure.
customer_reviews.author: MarkV

customer_reviews.title: Way smaller than I thought- hopefully it works if needed
customer_reviews.text: But surprised with the size actually, lot smaller than what's shown even with the metric sizes shown,
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Sunther

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased and peace of mind is good
customer_reviews.text: Bigger than expected so you will get what you pay for. Very pleased and peace of mind is good! I will buy again if my battery #'s increase.
customer_reviews.author: KA7DYG

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a bang bag for lipos. Strong Velcro but too much gap in the sides for my comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Impact9

customer_reviews.title: It is what it is!
customer_reviews.text: It's bigger than I thought but that's OK! It holds all 4 of my Bugs 5W batteries which is great; still a bit longer than needed though, but no complaints. And no fires so who knows if it really works! :-P
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Safety first!
customer_reviews.text: Has flaps inside the case for double safety. Fits one 6200mAh 2s with some spare room. Great size for travel.
customer_reviews.author: BoilingOil

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Seals up tight. It provides peace of mind knowing I can recharging my batteries safely.
customer_reviews.author: ImTheDude

customer_reviews.title: No Fire or Explosion to test durability
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had a battery catch fire or explode to test it but it looks nice ;- ) Looks like it will do it's job.
customer_reviews.author: Ken K.

customer_reviews.title: Good bag.
customer_reviews.text: Good size, fits my 2S Lipo's conveniently vs fire bags during charging. 5 stars if they would make a small indent for the battery leads to turn through while the top is velcro'ed shut.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Prime Fanatic

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a cool device for what it is intended
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a cool device for what it is intended. Have used it a couple times, but of course with no incident! Maybe I'll know more in a couple years. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Phone never caught on fire but I felt better. Five stars for comfort
customer_reviews.text: Used for my Note 7 before I had to exchange it two times. Phone never caught on fire but I felt better. Five stars for comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Woth the piece of mind.
customer_reviews.text: I have not had the bag set on fire yet so don't actually know how it works but for the price, the piece of mind is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: tom

customer_reviews.title: Not sure it is the sort of thing to love unless you have a battery set on fire which ...
customer_reviews.text: Not sure it is the sort of thing to love unless you have a battery set on fire which I have not had happen. Seems like it will though
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan L. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work fine
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my lipo batteries for my drone last time I flew commercially. The TSA never even opened up my drone case. I bought the large which is way more space than I needed for a few little batteries.
customer_reviews.author: A. Greubel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping perfect size for my little hubsan batteries. Hold nine with plenty of extra room for more
customer_reviews.author: TERRY

customer_reviews.title: Built well
customer_reviews.text: Made from heat and fire resistant material but one tiny problem.The pouch is real small just barely big enough to fit two average sized lipo or Nimh Batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Joseph Santora

customer_reviews.title: There really is no negative for this item. It ...
customer_reviews.text: There really is no negative for this item. It does exactly what it's created for. I use mine for storage and charging. Two full sized 3S hardcase LiPo's (138 x 45.5 x 35 mm) fit inside facing each other.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Good looking and quality feeling fire resistant bag.
customer_reviews.text: A good looking fire resistant bag for LiPo batteries. I hope I never need to test it's fire resistance, but I'm glad i have it!
customer_reviews.author: Nightsedge

customer_reviews.title: These work really great for all my batteries
customer_reviews.text: These work really great for all my batteries. I did cut just a little for the wires to stick out the top. They are perfect!! Everyone at the field are impressed with my portable charger and snazzy charging bags!
customer_reviews.author: Volvo 60R

customer_reviews.title: It looks great and seems of good build quality
customer_reviews.text: I've had no fire incidents so far and i'm not wishing for one just to get this thing tested. It looks great and seems of good build quality.
customer_reviews.author: M PoGi

customer_reviews.title: Keep Us All Safe In The Air
customer_reviews.text: My Lithium batteries wrapped in plastic, stored in this bag and carried on board were safe and sound passing Security at domestic and international airports.
customer_reviews.author: Lu

customer_reviews.title: Safety first
customer_reviews.text: Great pouch, even though you are supposed to use 1 pouch for each battery, I can fit 2 - 4000mAh and 1 - 2700mAh batteries in it comfortably for storage.
customer_reviews.author: mikeE

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: I like it. The only issue I have was that i was expecting to fit two batteries simultaneously but there is barely enough room for one.
customer_reviews.author: Eric F.

product_meta.title: Teenitor Fireproof Explosionproof Lipo Battery Safe Bag Lipo Battery Guard Safe Bag Pouch Sack for Charge & Storage 185x75x60mm Large Size
feature_bullets: Well Built: the lipo battery bag is coated with aluminum foil on both outside and inside, stuffed with the flame retardant fiber in between, which is just like a professional firefighter suit

Safest Equipment For Store And Charge Your Lipo Battery : Fully enclosed design (velcro close securely) can prevent the air going into bag when there is a flame burning, cut off the oxygen supply,also The fireproof bag material can prevent the fire spreading and effectively works for the battery protection
Great Size: 185 x 75 x 60mm (Large), fits probably 4-6 batteries depending on the type, can hold 3 DJI Mavic Pro batteries in this configuration or two other ways

Product Purpose: professionally designed to prevent the fire caused by incorrectly or poorly functioning lipo , especially during charging transporting it and storaging, protect your family and home, safe from the possibility of the batteries catching fire
Better Be Safe Than Sorry: It's always smart to practice safety, especially with lipo batteries! Always use a lipo safe container when charging and storing lipo batteries!
